title: Domination by My Lord
description: DOMINATION by my Billionaire Lord  When Magnus Lord, the devastatingly handsome billionaire summons the lovely young Tanya White, she has no choice but to come. Sent by private jet, with no idea of her destination, nor of what purpose Lord has planned for her, she is whisked into a dark, erotic adventure among the treasures and secrets of the ancient Italian city of Florence.  Tanya’s ordeal, in a leather creation cut especially to reveal her most intimate parts, is a training of agonies and shocks. She must do whatever Magnus Lord demands of her, anything. And all that she ever wants is more. Can she submit to his will, and can she endure the pain and the pleasures that it will lead her into?  WARNING: This 8,800+ word story contains lengthy, detailed, explicit and graphic scenes of many varieties of extremely adult activities. It is suitable ONLY for readers aged 18+. ALL characters portrayed are aged over 18 years.   Excerpt  Blindfolded and practically naked on the high roof in the moonlight, I stood exposed to all of Florence as he thrashed my buttocks and the backs of my thighs with a thin cane. My arms were fastened behind my back. I wore the briefest of sheer black briefs, and on open white man’s cotton shirt. Each swish of the cane was a raw shock, and almost always exactly on the spot where the last stroke still burned. Keeping my voice still was a great effort, but I was able to achieve it. I concentrated now on keeping my face still, on controlling the twitches and flinches…  Treat yourself to this erotic feast RIGHT NOW.
author: Alice May Ball
